main.name: Michael Chaharbaghi

main.contactmessage: Please feel free to reach out to me by email or LinkedIn message using the details below

cv.skillmessage: Full stack experience in widely used languages and technologies including Java, React, Redux and Jest

education.degree: First Class Honours - BSc Computer Science with Industrial Year
Mathematics (A), Physics (A), Chemistry (B), Biology (B, AS Level)

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Working as a Full Stack Developer within the Customer team building services to help Contact Centre agents across the Sainsburys Group.

work.title: Graduate Software Development Engineer
work.description: As part of the Argos Graduate Scheme I am underwent rotations within 3 different software development teams within Sainsbury's Tech across 20 months.

work.title: Technical Support Intern
work.description: Supporting the front and back end of ServiceNow, during my time there I worked with Service Portal, CMS, Access Control Lists, LDAP, SSO, import/export and email issues among much more on a daily basis to try and resolve customer issues and keep their instances running smoothly.
